short_summary: Purchase tablets chairs Ottawa ON, before March 31st 2023
description: Transport has been tasked to procure 210 tablet chairs. the goods are required to be delivered and installed in Ottawa, previous to: March 31st 2023.
full_summary:
**Tablet Chairs**
================
**Description**
---------------

Transport Canada is seeking the purchase, delivery and installation of tablet chairs to support its operational requirements. The bid solicitation is for 210 tablet chairs, with 105 units to be right-handed and 105 units to be left-handed.

### Acquisition Details
---------------------

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01016102
* **Solicitation Number**: T8080-220419
* **Publication Date**: 2022-12-06
* **Bid Closing Date**: 2022-12-16T14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity**: Transport Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Fanie Charron, fanie.charron@tc.gc.ca

### Additional Information
------------------------

This bid solicitation is subject to the [Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)][1], [Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement][2] and the [World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement][3]. Interested bidders should refer to the attached documentation for further details.

### Commercial Integration Strategy
---------------------------------

Please note that the bid closing date has been revised to December 16, 2022 @ 2:00 pm EST due to amendments raised to the bid solicitation document.

### Attachments
--------------

Please access the bid solicitation documentation at [the following URL][4] or refer to the attached file:

[1]: https://eu-sanctions.github.io/CETA.pdf
[2]: https://trad-comercentre-publiques.dfait-maeci.gc.ca/Canada-Panama-FTA_e.asp
[3]: https://www.wto.org/english/docs_e/official_e/wtocomp_mlj_e.htm
[4]: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/06/f540a2a6b1222f0b7aca80244b2c9273/t8080-220419_-_npp.pdf

### Bid Description
------------------

The requirement for 210 tablet chairs is to be fulfilled before March 31, 2023.

### Regions and Contacts
-----------------------

This bid solicitation is open to all interested suppliers and only individuals with a valid supplier identification number can participate in the bidding process
